name: Bullet Soldier
description:
PT-BR

Bullet Soldier te coloca no comando de um soldado, onde combate contra robôs e para vencer a guerra precisa elimina-los.

COMANDOS

A - D - SETAS = MOVE

BARRA DE ESPAÇO - W = PULA

R = RECARREGA

MOUSE 1 = TIRO

P - ESC = PAUSE

ENG

Bullet Soldier puts you in charge of a soldier, where he fights against robots and to win the war he needs to eliminate them.

COMMANDS 

 A - D - ARROWS = MOVE 

SPACE BAR - W = JUMP

R = RECHARGE 

MOUSE 1 = SHOT 

P - ESC = PAUSE
